## Plot of Quarter Mile Time by Rear Axle Ratio for `r params$cyl` Cylinders

```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE)
```

Hi, there. I'm a child document for `r params$cyl` Cylinders

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
data8 <- mtcars %>% filter(cyl == params$cyl)

ggplot(data8, aes(drat, qsec)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  ggtitle("Plot of MPG by Engine Displacement for 8 Cylinders")
```
